Home.title: AICE UI
Home.description: An open-source UI component library to help you build applications faster. It provides pre-built components like conversations, messages and more. Built with Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui.

ComponentPage.install: Please select your favorite package manager to install the component.

glass-surface.label: Glass Surface
glass-surface.description: A glass surface component with blur and distortion effects. It is built with Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui.

code-block.label: Code Block
code-block.description: A code block component with syntax highlighting and line numbers. It is built with Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui.

radar-chart.label: Radar Chart
radar-chart.description: A radar chart component with customizable data and optional title and description. It is built with Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui.

theme-switch.label: Theme Switch
theme-switch.description: A theme switch component with dark and light mode. It is built with Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui.

floating-circles.label: Floating Circles
floating-circles.description: A floating circles component with customizable data and optional title and description. It is built with Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui.

matrix-code.label: Matrix Code
matrix-code.description: A matrix code component with glitch effect and optional vignette effect. It is built with Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui.

webcam.label: Webcam
webcam.description: A webcam component with customizable data and optional title and description. It is built with Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui.

motion-wheel.label: Motion Wheel
motion-wheel.description: A motion wheel component with customizable data and optional title and description. It is built with Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui.

3d-flip-card.label: 3D Flip Card
3d-flip-card.description: A 3d flip card component with customizable data and optional title and description. It is built with Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui.

glyph-katakana.label: Glyph Katakana
glyph-katakana.description: A glyph katakana component with customizable data and optional title and description. It is built with Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui.

slide-up-letters.label: Slide Up Letters
slide-up-letters.description: A slide up letters component with customizable data and optional title and description. It is built with Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui.
